Everything.Description: Everything is a desktop search utility for Windows that allows you to quickly find files and folders by name.

HWMonitor.Description: HWMonitor is a hardware monitoring program that reads PC systems' main health sensors: voltages, temperatures, and fan speeds.

CPU-Z.Description: CPU-Z is a freeware system profiling and monitoring application for Microsoft Windows that gathers information on some of the main devices in your system.

GPU-Z.Description: GPU-Z is a lightweight utility designed to provide vital information about your video card and graphics processor.

Crystal Disk Info.Description: CrystalDiskInfo is a HDD/SSD utility software which supports a part of USB, Intel RAID and NVMe.

Autoruns.Description: Autoruns shows you what programs are configured to run during system bootup or login, and when you start various built-in Windows applications.

CCleaner.Description: CCleaner is a utility program used to clean potentially unwanted files and invalid Windows Registry entries from a computer.
